attributes.action: be sectioned under the mental health act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I BELIEVE THAT TONY BLAIR HAS LOST HIS MARBLES AND IS UNFIT TO BE LEFT ON HIS OWN FAR LESS GOVERN THIS COUNTRY. TAKE HIM AWAY. NOW!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
